Description: Verify new bookmarks can be created (not added).
Verify that there are no 'dead' default links.
Verify that changes are saved over restart/crash

Change the name of a bookmark without use of the bookmark properties
      dialog.

Determine whether text copied from a formatted web page (such as
      within a table) has a "non-annoying" layout.

Confirm that dragging a link across browser windows
      opens the link.
Vrify that dragging an image onto the desktop saves the image

Verify that browser contents can be dragged to
      a Composer or Compose Mail window.

Confirm that text, links, and images dragged to a
      non-modal dialog are handled properly

Confirm that dragging an Internet shortcut to the
      browser window opens the URL

Confirm that dragging a supported image file
       to the browser window display the file

Verify that items dragged onto the
      application icon are handled properly

Determine if the application and OS properly
      handle items dragged from the Bookmark Manager

Verify that you can stop a form's data from being saved from
      the popup dialog box, and you click no.

Verify that if you enter data in the Form Manager and then
      click cancel, the data has not been saved

Verify that it is possible to install only the needed help files
        (for components that are actually installed)

Verify that there is an in Index of help content and a list of
        keywords to links in the help content. (Verify the content is in local
        documents)

Verify that in the Glossary there includes a section for an
        Intro/tutorial for NS6.

Verify that in the Glossary there includes a tutorial on how to do
        better searches

Verify that minimization, maximize and close buttons of the toolbar
        invoke the correct behavior
Verify that you can't drag docs into the help window

Determine whether Instant Messenger help content displays
        correctly

Determine whether Customzing Netscape 6 help content displays
        correctly
Determine whether Same time messaging displays correctly
Determine whether Streamlined Interface displays correctly

Determine whether the Best Standards Support displays
        correctly

Determine whether Netscape Technical Support displays
        correctly
Determine whether the Security Center displays correctly

Verify that the correct link is recorded after a server
        redirect.
Delete a History entry
Don't ever show 302 redirects in history
Verify correct recently visited sites are in go menu.
Verify browser goes back and forward to recently visited sites

Verify that a new session is started with a new browser window or a
        restart.

Feature: Back and forward with named anchors
Description:
Verify browser goes back and forward correctly from sites that use
        named anchors

Determine that it is possible to resize an image to it's original
        size after it has been resized to window size.

Determine whether images load directly into the web browser from a
        networked server.

Determine whether an automatically updated web cam continues to
        refresh over an extended (24 hour) period of time.

Verify that the browser behaves correctly after selections are made
      in the save password dialog box

Verify that the browser behaves correctly after selections are made
      in the save password dialog box

Verify that when you disable password manager from the preferences
      panel, you no longer are asked if you would like to save passwords and
      longer get prefilled info on sites

Verify that when you have saved a username and password in password
      manager, this information can be viewed in the password manager through
      preferences

Verify that you can remove a username and password for a given site
      and it will no longer autofill on that sight nor will it be listed in
      password manager (espn.com)

Verify that you can remove all username and password information and
      it will no longer autofill nor will anything be listed in password
      manager
Print a test page and check to see if it prints properly
Determine if a page with indentations prints as seen on screen
Determine if the Mozillazine Poll results page prints properly
Determine if  large page print properly
Determine if images print correctly
Determine if tables print correctly
Determine that off-line printing works
Determine that header/footer info gets printed
Determine if windows media player works fine

Verify that a basic search from within the Search tab can be
      executed
Verify that a search query/results can be bookmarked
Cursors should have the right icon when mousing over
Adding a already added panel
Verify list of available remote panels
Verify reordering of panels works
Verify that nothing changes when you cancel
Tests to access this dialog from the menubar and keyboard.

Determine that interface features (buttons, textfield, droplist)
        appear and behave as expected. Includes tests to dismiss dialog.

Use of the native Mac OS file picker to navigate through
        directories and open files (html, plaintext, image). Cancellation also
        tested.
Find with and without case sensitivity. Test Find Again.
Access from main menu and access keys.

Scrolling and keyboard navigation within the info window. Also
        should be able to use [applicable] keyboard accelerators. Resize source
        window. Manipulate the grippy.
Verify Classic theme works as advertised

Visually inspect menu bar, floating component bar and all the
        tool bars

Feature:
Verify all the selectable items on other applications under
        Classic theme
Description:
Click through all the items on menu bar and tool bars under AIM,
        Composer, Mail and Address book to see all the looks and feel are
        consistence under Classic theme

Feature: Verify all the selectable items work under Modern theme
Description:
Click through all the items on menu bar, tool bars, and floating
        component bar under Modern theme
Click to maximize (expandto content on Mac)

Grab left/right window edge and drag to resize. Not available on
        Mac.
Click in the scrollbar area to page up/down.

Verify that toolbars can be dragged&dropped to change their
        order
Verify correct bookmarks are installed in Bookmarks bar.
